00107 void BtnAccountPrevPageButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00108 {
00109       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00110       {
00111             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00112             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00113       }
00114       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00115       {
00116             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00117             {
00118                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00119 
00120                   iCurrentAccountPage--;
00121 
00122                   if (iCurrentAccountPage == 0)
00123                   {
00124                         DisableButton(guiAccountPrevButton);
00125                   }
00126 
00127                   if (iCurrentAccountPage < iTotalAccountPages - 1)
00128                   {
00129                         EnableButton(guiAccountNextButton);
00130                   }
00131 
00132                   RenderMercsAccount();
00133 
00134                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00135             }
00136       }
00137       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00138       {
00139             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00140             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00141       }
00142 }

00144 void BtnAccountNextPageButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00145 {
00146       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00147       {
00148             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00149             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00150       }
00151       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00152       {
00153             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00154             {
00155                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00156 
00157                   iCurrentAccountPage++;
00158 
00159                   if (iCurrentAccountPage == iTotalAccountPages - 1)
00160                   {
00161                         DisableButton(guiAccountNextButton);
00162                   }
00163 
00164                   if (iCurrentAccountPage > 0)
00165                   {
00166                         EnableButton(guiAccountPrevButton);
00167                   }
00168 
00169                   RenderMercsAccount();
00170 
00171                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00172             }
00173       }
00174       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00175       {
00176             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00177             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00178       }
00179 }

00181 // WANNE 3
00182 INT32 GetNumberOfHiredMercs()
00183 {
00184       UINT8 usMercID;
00185       UINT8 i = 0;
00186       UINT8 count = 0;
00187       UINT32      uiContractCharge;
00188 
00189       giMercTotalContractCharge = 0;
00190 
00191       for (i = 0; i<=TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
00192       {
00193             if( i == MERC_LARRY_ROACHBURN )
00194                   continue;
00195 
00196             usMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( i );
00197 
00198             // Is the merc hired?
00199             if( IsMercOnTeam( (UINT8)usMercID )  || gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].iMercMercContractLength != 0 )
00200             {
00201                   uiContractCharge = gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].sSalary * gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].iMercMercContractLength;
00202                   giMercTotalContractCharge += uiContractCharge;
00203 
00204                   count++;
00205             }
00206       }
00207 
00208       return count;
00209 }

00217 BOOLEAN EnterMercsAccount()
00218 {
00219       // WANNE 3 - BEGIN
00220       UINT8 mercOverPage = 0;
00221 
00222       iCurrentAccountPage = 0;
00223 
00224       iNumberOfHiredMercs = GetNumberOfHiredMercs();
00225       
00226       // Can only display MAX_NUMBER_MERCS mercs per page
00227       iTotalAccountPages = iNumberOfHiredMercs / MAX_NUMBER_MERCS_ON_PAGE;
00228       mercOverPage = iNumberOfHiredMercs % MAX_NUMBER_MERCS_ON_PAGE;
00229 
00230       if (mercOverPage > 0)
00231             iTotalAccountPages++;
00232 
00233       if (iTotalAccountPages == 0)
00234             iTotalAccountPages++;
00235 
00236       // WANNE 3 - END
00237 
00238   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00239 
00240       InitMercBackGround();
00241 
00242       // Merce order grid (the last page)
00243       // load the Arrow graphic and add it
00244       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00245       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_ORDERGRID );
00246       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMercOrderGrid));
00247

00249       // load the Arrow graphic and add it

00253

00255       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00256       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\AccountNumber.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00257       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAccountNumberGrid));
00258 
00259 
00260       guiAccountButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\BigButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00261 
00262       // Prev Button
00263       guiAccountPrevButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiAccountButtonImage, MercAccountPageText[0],

00268                                                                                MERC_AC_PREV_BUTTON_X, MERC_AC_PREV_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00269                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnAccountPrevPageButtonCallback);
00270       SetButtonCursor(guiAccountPrevButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00271       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiAccountPrevButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00272 
00273       // Next Button
00274       guiAccountNextButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiAccountButtonImage, MercAccountPageText[1],
00275                                                                                FONT12ARIAL, 
00276                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_UP_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00277                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_DOWN_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00278                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00279                                                                                MERC_AC_NEXT_BUTTON_X, MERC_AC_NEXT_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00280                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnAccountNextPageButtonCallback);
00281       SetButtonCursor(guiAccountNextButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);

00283       
00284

00286

00288                                                                                FONT12ARIAL,

00306 
00307 
00308 //    RenderMercsAccount();
00309 
00310       //if true, will display a msgbox telling user that they dont have enough funds
00311       gfMercPlayerDoesntHaveEnoughMoney_DisplayWarning = FALSE;
00312 
00313       // Disable the prev button, because we are on the first page
00314       DisableButton(guiAccountPrevButton);
00315 
00316       if (iTotalAccountPages == 1)
00317       {
00318             DisableButton(guiAccountNextButton);
00319       }
00320 
00321       return( TRUE );

00324 void ExitMercsAccount()
00325 {
00326       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMercOrderGrid);
00327       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAccountNumberGrid);
00328 
00329       UnloadButtonImage( guiMercAuthorizeButtonImage );
00330       RemoveButton( guiMercAuthorizeBoxButton );
00331       RemoveButton( guiMercBackBoxButton );
00332 
00333       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMercOrderGrid0);
00334       UnloadButtonImage( guiAccountButtonImage );
00335       RemoveButton ( guiAccountPrevButton );
00336       RemoveButton ( guiAccountNextButton );
00337 
00338       RemoveMercBackGround();
00339 }

00341 void HandleMercsAccount()
00342 {
00343       //if true, will display a msgbox telling user that they dont have enough funds
00344       if( gfMercPlayerDoesntHaveEnoughMoney_DisplayWarning )
00345       {
00346             gfMercPlayerDoesntHaveEnoughMoney_DisplayWarning = FALSE;
00347 
00348             DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BLUE_ON_GREY, L"Transfer failed.  No funds available.", LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00349       }
00350 }

00352 void RenderMercsAccount()
00353 {
00354       wchar_t           sText[100];
00355   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00356 
00357       DrawMecBackGround();
00358 
00359       // Account Number Grid
00360       if (iCurrentAccountPage == iTotalAccountPages - 1)
00361       {
00362             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiMercOrderGrid);
00363       }
00364       else
00365       {
00366             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiMercOrderGrid0);
00367       }
00368 
00369       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_AC_ORDER_GRID_X, MERC_AC_ORDER_GRID_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00370 
00371       // Merc Order Grid
00372       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiAccountNumberGrid);
00373       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_AC_ACCOUNT_NUMBER_X, MERC_AC_ACCOUNT_NUMBER_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00374 
00375       //Display Players account number
00376       swprintf(sText, L"%s %05d", MercAccountText[MERC_ACCOUNT_ACCOUNT], LaptopSaveInfo.guiPlayersMercAccountNumber);
00377       DrawTextToScreen( sText, MERC_AC_ACCOUNT_NUMBER_TEXT_X, MERC_AC_ACCOUNT_NUMBER_TEXT_Y, 0, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_FONT, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00378 
00379       //Display the order grid titles
00380       DrawTextToScreen( MercAccountText[MERC_ACCOUNT_MERC], MERC_AC_FIRST_COLUMN_X, MERC_AC_MERC_TITLE_Y, MERC_AC_FIRST_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_FONT, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00381       DrawTextToScreen( MercAccountText[MERC_ACCOUNT_DAYS], MERC_AC_SECOND_COLUMN_X, MERC_AC_MERC_TITLE_Y, MERC_AC_SECOND_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_FONT, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00382       DrawTextToScreen( MercAccountText[MERC_ACCOUNT_RATE], MERC_AC_THIRD_COLUMN_X, MERC_AC_MERC_TITLE_Y, MERC_AC_THIRD_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_FONT, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00383       DrawTextToScreen( MercAccountText[MERC_ACCOUNT_CHARGE], MERC_AC_FOURTH_COLUMN_X, MERC_AC_MERC_TITLE_Y, MERC_AC_FOURTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_FONT, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00384       
00385       if (iCurrentAccountPage == iTotalAccountPages - 1)
00386       {
00387             DrawTextToScreen( MercAccountText[MERC_ACCOUNT_TOTAL], MERC_AC_THIRD_COLUMN_X, MERC_AC_TOTAL_COST_Y, MERC_AC_THIRD_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_FONT, MERC_ACCOUNT_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00388       }
00389 
00390       DisplayHiredMercs();
00391 
00392       // giMercTotalContractCharge  gets set with the price in DisplayHiredMercs(), so if there is currently no charge, disable the button
00393       if( giMercTotalContractCharge == 0 )
00394       {
00395             DisableButton( guiMercAuthorizeBoxButton );
00396       }
00397 
00398 
00399 
00400   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00401       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00402   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00403 }

00406 void BtnMercAuthorizeButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00407 {
00408       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00409       {
00410             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00411             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00412       }
00413       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00414       {
00415             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00416             {
00417                   CHAR16      wzAuthorizeString[512];
00418                   CHAR16      wzDollarAmount[128];
00419 
00420                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00421 
00422                   swprintf( wzDollarAmount, L"%d", giMercTotalContractCharge );
00423 
00424                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( wzDollarAmount );
00425                   InsertDollarSignInToString( wzDollarAmount );
00426 
00427                   //create the string to show to the user
00428                   swprintf( wzAuthorizeString, MercAccountText[MERC_ACCOUNT_AUTHORIZE_CONFIRMATION], wzDollarAmount );
00429 
00430                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BLUE_ON_GREY, wzAuthorizeString, LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, MercAuthorizePaymentMessageBoxCallBack );
00431 
00432                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00433             }
00434       }
00435       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00436       {
00437             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00438             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00439       }
00440 }

00443 void BtnMercBackButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00444 {
00445       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00446       {
00447             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00448             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00449       }
00450       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00451       {
00452             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00453             {
00454                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00455 
00456                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
00457                   gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_ACCOUNTS_PAGE;
00458 
00459                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00460             }
00461       }
00462       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00463       {
00464             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00465             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00466       }
00467 } 
00468 
00469 void DisplayHiredMercs()
00470 {
00471       UINT16      usPosY;
00472       UINT32      uiContractCharge; 
00473       wchar_t     sTemp[20];
00474       UINT8 i, usMercID;
00475       UINT8 ubFontColor;
00476       UINT8 usMercIDStart;
00477       UINT8 usMercIDEnd;
00478       INT16 usCurrentRow = -1;
00479 
00480       usPosY = MERC_AC_FIRST_ROW_Y + 3;
00481 
00482       // Start
00483       usMercIDStart = iCurrentAccountPage * MAX_NUMBER_MERCS_ON_PAGE;
00484 
00485       // End
00486       if ((usMercIDStart + MAX_NUMBER_MERCS_ON_PAGE) > TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_MERCS)
00487       {
00488             usMercIDEnd = TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_MERCS;
00489       }
00490       else
00491       {
00492             usMercIDEnd = usMercIDStart + MAX_NUMBER_MERCS_ON_PAGE;
00493       }
00494 
00495       // At least second page
00496       // This approach is needed, because auf LARRY_ROACHBURN
00497       if (usMercIDStart > 0)
00498       {
00499             usMercIDStart++;
00500       }
00501 
00502       // Loop through all the mercs
00503   for(i=usMercIDStart; i <= TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_MERCS ; i++)
00504       {
00505             // We have no more free rows on the current page
00506             if (usCurrentRow == usMercIDEnd - 1)
00507                   break;
00508 
00509             //if it larry Roach burn advance.  ( cause larry is in twice, a sober larry and a stoned larry )
00510             if( i == MERC_LARRY_ROACHBURN )
00511                   continue;
00512 
00513             usMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( i );
00514 
00515             //is the merc on the team, or is owed money
00516             if( IsMercOnTeam( (UINT8)usMercID )  || gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].iMercMercContractLength != 0 )
00517             {
00518                   usCurrentRow++;
00519 
00520                   //if the merc is dead, make the color red, else white
00521                   if( IsMercDead( usMercID ) )
00522                         ubFontColor = MERC_ACCOUNT_DEAD_TEXT_COLOR;
00523                   else
00524                         ubFontColor = MERC_ACCOUNT_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR;
00525 
00526                   uiContractCharge = 0;
00527 
00528                   //Display Mercs Name
00529                   DrawTextToScreen( gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].zName, MERC_AC_FIRST_COLUMN_X+5, usPosY, MERC_AC_FIRST_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00530 
00531                   //Display The # of days the merc has worked since last paid
00532 
00533                   swprintf(sTemp, L"%d", gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].iMercMercContractLength );
00534                   DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, MERC_AC_SECOND_COLUMN_X, usPosY, MERC_AC_SECOND_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00535 
00536                   //Display the mercs rate
00537                   swprintf(sTemp, L"$%6d",gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].sSalary );
00538                   DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, MERC_AC_THIRD_COLUMN_X, usPosY, MERC_AC_THIRD_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00539 
00540                   //Display the total charge
00541                   uiContractCharge = gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].sSalary * gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].iMercMercContractLength;
00542                   swprintf(sTemp, L"$%6d", uiContractCharge );
00543                   DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, MERC_AC_FOURTH_COLUMN_X, usPosY, MERC_AC_FOURTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00544 
00545                   //giMercTotalContractCharge += uiContractCharge;
00546                   usPosY += MERC_AC_ROW_SIZE;
00547             }
00548       }
00549 
00550       // Last page
00551       if (iCurrentAccountPage == iTotalAccountPages - 1)
00552       {
00553             // Output total contract
00554             swprintf(sTemp, L"$%6d", giMercTotalContractCharge );
00555             DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, MERC_AC_FOURTH_COLUMN_X, MERC_AC_TOTAL_COST_Y, MERC_AC_FOURTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, MERC_ACCOUNT_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, MERC_ACCOUNT_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00556       }
00557 }

00560 
00561 void SettleMercAccounts()
00562 {
00563 //    SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00564       INT16 i;
00565       UINT8 ubMercID;
00566       INT32 iPartialPayment=0;
00567       INT32 iContractCharge=0;
00568 
00569 
00570       //loop through all the MERC mercs the player has on the team
00571       for(i=0; i<NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
00572       {
00573             ubMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( (UINT8) i );
00574 
00575             //if the merc is on the team, or does the player owe money for a fired merc
00576             if( IsMercOnTeam( ubMercID ) || ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].iMercMercContractLength != 0 ) )
00577             {
00578                   //Calc the contract charge
00579                   iContractCharge = gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].sSalary * gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].iMercMercContractLength;
00580 
00581                   //if the player can afford to pay this merc
00582                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance >= iPartialPayment + iContractCharge )
00583                   {
00584                         //Increment the counter that keeps track of the of the number of days the player has paid for merc services
00585                         LaptopSaveInfo.guiNumberOfMercPaymentsInDays += gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].iMercMercContractLength;
00586 
00587                         //Then reset the merc contract counter
00588                         gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].iMercMercContractLength = 0;
00589 
00590                         //Add this mercs contract charge to the total
00591                         iPartialPayment += iContractCharge;
00592 
00593                         gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].uiTotalCostToDate += iContractCharge;
00594                   }
00595             }
00596       }
00597 
00598       if( iPartialPayment == 0 )
00599       {
00600             //if true, will display a msgbox telling user that they dont have enough funds
00601             gfMercPlayerDoesntHaveEnoughMoney_DisplayWarning = TRUE;
00602             return;
00603       }
00604 
00605       // add the transaction to the finance page
00606       AddTransactionToPlayersBook( PAY_SPECK_FOR_MERC, GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ), GetWorldTotalMin(), -iPartialPayment );
00607       AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_SETTLED_ACCOUNTS_AT_MERC, GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ), GetWorldTotalMin(), -1, -1 );
00608 
00609       //Increment the amount of money paid to speck
00610       LaptopSaveInfo.uiTotalMoneyPaidToSpeck += iPartialPayment;
00611 
00612       //If the player only made a partial payment
00613       if( iPartialPayment != giMercTotalContractCharge )
00614             gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_MAKES_PARTIAL_PAYMENT;
00615       else
00616       {
00617             gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_MAKES_FULL_PAYMENT;
00618 
00619             //if the merc's account was in suspense, re-enable it
00620             // CJC Dec 1 2002: an invalid account become valid again.
00621             //if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus != MERC_ACCOUNT_INVALID )
00622                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus = MERC_ACCOUNT_VALID;
00623 
00624             
00625             // Since the player has paid, make sure speck wont complain about the lack of payment
00626             LaptopSaveInfo.uiSpeckQuoteFlags &= ~SPECK_QUOTE__SENT_EMAIL_ABOUT_LACK_OF_PAYMENT;
00627       }
00628 
00629       //Go to the merc homepage to say the quote
00630       guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
00631       gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_ACCOUNTS_PAGE;
00632 
00633 
00634 /*
00635 
00636       //if the player doesnt have enough money to fully pay for the all the mercs contract
00637       if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance < giMercTotalContractCharge )

00640             INT32 iContractCharge=0;
00641             SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00642 
00643             //try to make a partial payment by looping through all the mercs and settling them 1 at a time

00726 
00727 void MercAuthorizePaymentMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
00728 {
00729       // yes, clear the form
00730   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
00731       {
00732             //if the player owes Speck money, then settle the accounts
00733             if( giMercTotalContractCharge )
00734                   SettleMercAccounts();
00735       }
00736 }

00738 
00739 UINT32      CalculateHowMuchPlayerOwesSpeck()
00740 {
00741       UINT8                   i=0;
00742       UINT32                  uiContractCharge=0;
00743       UINT16                  usMercID;
00744 
00745 
00746       // WANNE 2
00747       for(i=0; i<TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_MERCS; i++)
00748       {
00749             //if it larry Roach burn advance.  ( cause larry is in twice, a sober larry and a stoned larry )
00750             if( i == MERC_LARRY_ROACHBURN )
00751                   continue;
00752 
00753             usMercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( i );
00754             //if( IsMercOnTeam( (UINT8)usMercID ) )
00755             {
00756                   //Calc salary for the # of days the merc has worked since last paid
00757                   uiContractCharge += gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].sSalary * gMercProfiles[ usMercID ].iMercMercContractLength;
00758             }
00759       }
00760 
00761       return( uiContractCharge );
00762 }
